desc: A unique range of frozen, freeze-dried, and powdered organic feijoa fruit. Feijoas are high in bio-actives, vitamins C and K, and have a unique and moreish flavour. Heather’s Feijoas are 100% New Zealand grown, gluten and GMO free, and Biogro-certified organic.

layout.text: If you love feijoas, you will love our products, it's as simple as that
